EmailTemplate.name: Case Management SEO general
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Your request has been completed as requested.
If you have any questions you may respond to this email within 14 days and your case will be reopened and evaluated by ASU Student Employment.
ASU Student Employment Office | Financial Aid & Scholarship Services Arizona State University | P.O. BOX 870412 | Tempe, AZ 85287-0412 PH: 480.965.5186 | FAX: 480.965.9816 Website: https://students.asu.edu/employment Department Requests for FWS: https://docs.google.com/a/asu.edu/spreadsheet/viewform?fromEmail=true&formkey=dEtMcWktQ09XLXJsUTNzU3VHZDJmZWc6MQ
